node.html:
Intelligent AI-powered assistant designed for classroom management and educational support:

  • Leverages advanced AI technologies to enhance the learning experience
  • Provides automated assistance for both educators and students
  • Features intelligent query handling and automated response generation
  • Seamless integration with educational workflows to streamline classroom operations

Modern Flutter application for managing business partnerships with comprehensive features:

  • Real-time status tracking with automated reminders for pending verifications and expirations
  • Interactive analytics dashboard with charts visualizing partnership distribution and trends
  • Smart archiving system with automatic date validation to maintain data integrity
  • PDF export capabilities and beautiful Material Design 3 interface with theme support

A comprehensive partnership management system that streamlines the process of managing and tracking business partnerships:

  • Built with Spring Boot and Angular for robust backend and responsive frontend
  • Implemented Docker containerization for easy deployment
  • Set up CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins
  • Features include partnership tracking, status monitoring, and analytics dashboard

A modular education platform with comprehensive academic management features:

  • Implemented core modules for course, event, evaluation, PFE, and partnership management
  • Enabled intelligent partner discovery using Python/Selenium web scraping
  • Developed AI-powered recommendation systems using Flask (SVC, K-means)
  • Deployed containerized services using Docker for scalability and efficient CI/CD

Advanced ML-based system for assessing company partnership eligibility:

  • Achieved 96%+ accuracy in partnership matching
  • Built NLP interface for conversational queries and company comparisons
  • Integrated automated data pipeline with web scraping and real-time scoring
  • Implemented interactive data visualizations for comparative analytics

A comprehensive financial management and e-commerce solution:

  • Built a robust multi-platform application using JavaFX and FlutterFlow for desktop
  • Implemented secure user authentication and role-based access control
  • Created dynamic product catalog with real-time inventory management
  • Developed integrated shopping cart with secure payment processing
  • Designed intuitive financial dashboard for expense tracking and budgeting
